name: puppetlabs-lvm
summary: Puppet types and providers to manage LVM

parameters.name: fs_type
parameters.doc: The file system type. eg. ext3.

parameters.name: options
parameters.doc: Params for the mkfs command. eg. -l internal,agcount=x

providers.name: lvm
providers.doc: Manages filesystem of a logical volume

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc:
The name of the logical volume.  This is the unqualified name and will be
            automatically added to the volume group's device path (e.g., '/dev/$vg/$lv').

parameters.name: volume_group
parameters.doc:
The volume group name associated with this logical volume.  This will automatically
            set this volume group as a dependency, but it must be defined elsewhere using the
            volume_group resource type.

parameters.name: initial_size
parameters.doc: The initial size of the logical volume. This will only apply to newly-created volumes

properties.name: size
properties.doc: The size of the logical volume. Set to undef to use all available space

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the volume group.

properties.name: physical_volumes
properties.doc:
The list of physical volumes to be included in the volume group; this
             will automatically set these as dependencies, but they must be defined elsewhere
             using the physical_volume resource type.
